com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

Interface SegmentedNetworkInfo


  • public interface SegmentedNetworkInfo
    Options used for configuring a segmented network (separate send and receive networks).
    See Also:
    ConnectOptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String interfaceName()
      A character representation of an IP address or hostname associated with the local network interface to use for sending and receiving content.
      SegmentedNetworkInfo interfaceName(java.lang.String interfaceName)
      Network interface card to bind to for send and recv networks.
      java.lang.String recvAddress()
      Address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration.
      SegmentedNetworkInfo recvAddress(java.lang.String recvAddress)
      Configures the receive address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration.
      java.lang.String recvServiceName()
      The receive network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration.
      SegmentedNetworkInfo recvServiceName(java.lang.String recvServiceName)
      Configures the receive network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration.
      java.lang.String sendAddress()
      The send address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration.
      SegmentedNetworkInfo sendAddress(java.lang.String sendAddress)
      Configures the send address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration.
      java.lang.String sendServiceName()
      The send network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration.
      SegmentedNetworkInfo sendServiceName(java.lang.String sendServiceName)
      Configures the send network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration.
      java.lang.String unicastServiceName()
      The numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use for all unicast UDP traffic in a unified network configuration.
      SegmentedNetworkInfo unicastServiceName(java.lang.String unicastServiceName)
      Configures the numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use for all unicast UDP traffic in a unified network configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • recvAddress

        SegmentedNetworkInfo recvAddress(java.lang.String recvAddress)
        Configures the receive address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is received on this recvAddress:recvServiceName pair.
        Parameters:
        recvAddress - the recvAddress to set

      • recvAddress

        java.lang.String recvAddress()
        Address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is received on this recvAddress:recvServiceName pair.
        Returns:
        the recvAddress

      • recvServiceName

        SegmentedNetworkInfo recvServiceName(java.lang.String recvServiceName)
        Configures the receive network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is received on this recvAddress:recvServiceName pair.
        Parameters:
        recvServiceName - the recvServiceName to set

      • recvServiceName

        java.lang.String recvServiceName()
        The receive network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is received on this recvAddress:recvServiceName pair.
        Returns:
        the recvServiceName

      • unicastServiceName

        SegmentedNetworkInfo unicastServiceName(java.lang.String unicastServiceName)
        Configures the numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use for all unicast UDP traffic in a unified network configuration. This parameter is only required for multicast connection types (ConnectionTypes.RELIABLE_MCAST). If multiple connections or applications are running on the same host, this must be unique for each connection.
        Parameters:
        unicastServiceName - the unicastServiceName to set

      • unicastServiceName

        java.lang.String unicastServiceName()
        The numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use for all unicast UDP traffic in a unified network configuration. This parameter is only required for multicast connection types (ConnectionTypes.RELIABLE_MCAST). If multiple connections or applications are running on the same host, this must be unique for each connection.
        Returns:
        the unicastServiceName

      • interfaceName

        SegmentedNetworkInfo interfaceName(java.lang.String interfaceName)
        Network interface card to bind to for send and recv networks. If NULL, will use default NIC.
        Parameters:
        interfaceName - the interfaceName to set

      • interfaceName

        java.lang.String interfaceName()
        A character representation of an IP address or hostname associated with the local network interface to use for sending and receiving content. This value is intended for use in systems which have multiple network interface cards, and if not specified the default network interface will be used.
        Returns:
        the interfaceName

      • sendAddress

        SegmentedNetworkInfo sendAddress(java.lang.String sendAddress)
        Configures the send address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is sent on this sendAddress:sendServiceName pair.
        Parameters:
        sendAddress - the sendAddress to set

      • sendAddress

        java.lang.String sendAddress()
        The send address or hostname to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is sent on this sendAddress:sendServiceName pair.
        Returns:
        the sendAddress

      • sendServiceName

        SegmentedNetworkInfo sendServiceName(java.lang.String sendServiceName)
        Configures the send network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is sent on this sendAddress:sendServiceName pair.
        Parameters:
        sendServiceName - the sendServiceName to set

      • sendServiceName

        java.lang.String sendServiceName()
        The send network's numeric port number or service name (as defined in etc/services file) to use in a segmented network configuration. All content is sent on this sendAddress:sendServiceName pair.
        Returns:
        the sendServiceName
